full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'GO BA'I LHA LNGA'I GSHEGS GTOR 'DOD DON MYUR 'GRUB ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES 'GO BA'I LHA LNGA LA GSHEGS GTOR 'BUL TSUL 'DOD DON MYUR 'GRUB BCES BYA BA 'DI NI, DAD LDAN DGE SLONG BLO BZANG SHES RAB DANG, DGE SLONG SBYIN PA RGYA MTSO GNYIS KYIS YANG YANG BSKUL LBA BZHIN DU, YE DPAL MING CAN GYIS BRIS PA DES KYANG RANG GZHAN LA BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,DGE'O, ,LEGS SO, ,)
